name: Isah Abubakar Sadiq
title: Health Information Management Tutor

education.institution: Katsina State College of Health Sciences

bio: Isah Abubakar Sadiq is a professional health information tutor who focuses on data management, medical records accuracy, and digital health literacy. He equips future health workers with the skills to maintain reliable health data systems that support efficient decision-making in healthcare delivery.
